verses.verse: ( How Majestic Is Your Name!) לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- According to הַגִּתִּ֗ית <WH1665> hag·git·tîṯ Gittith. ( Gittith is probably a musical or liturgical term; here and in and 84.) מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David. יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nê·nū our Lord, מָֽה־ <WH4100> māh- how אַדִּ֣יר <WH117> ’ad·dîr majestic שִׁ֭מְךָ <WH8034> mə·ḵā is Your name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl in all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth! אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer You תְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> tə·nāh have set ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <WH1935> hō·wḏ·ḵā Your glory עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- above הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> haš·šā·mā·yim the heavens.

מִפִּ֤י <WH6310> mip·pî From the mouths עֽוֹלְלִ֨ים׀ <WH5768> ‘ō·wl·lîm of children וְֽיֹנְקִים֮ <WH3243> wə·yō·nə·qîm and infants יִסַּ֪דְתָּ֫ <WH3245> yis·saḏ·tā You have ordained עֹ֥ז <WH5797> ‘ōz praise ( Literally You have ordained strength; LXX You have prepared praise; cited in ) לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an on account of צוֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <WH6887> ṣō·wr·re·ḵā Your adversaries, לְהַשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> lə·haš·bîṯ to silence א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> ’ō·w·yêḇ the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <WH5358> ū·miṯ·naq·qêm and avenger.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- When אֶרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> ’er·’eh I behold שָׁ֭מֶיךָ <WH8064> me·ḵā Your heavens, מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śê the work אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH676> ’eṣ·bə·‘ō·ṯe·ḵā of Your fingers, יָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> yā·rê·aḥ the moon וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <WH3556> wə·ḵō·w·ḵā·ḇîm and the stars, אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer which כּוֹנָֽנְתָּה׃ <WH3559> kō·w·nā·nə·tāh You have set in place —

מָֽה־ <WH4100> māh- what אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <WH582> ’ĕ·nō·wōš is man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- that תִזְכְּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH2142> ṯiz·kə·ren·nū You are mindful [of him], וּבֶן־ <WH1121> ū·ḇen- or the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî that תִפְקְדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH6485> ṯip̄·qə·ḏen·nū You care for him?

וַתְּחַסְּרֵ֣הוּ <WH2637> wat·tə·ḥas·sə·rê·hū You made him a little מְּ֭עַט <WH4592> mə·‘aṭ lower מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> mê·’ĕ·lō·hîm than the angels; ( Or than God or than the heavenly beings; see also LXX.) וְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> wə·ḵā·ḇō·wḏ with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <WH1926> wə·hā·ḏār and honor. תְּעַטְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH5849> tə·‘aṭ·ṭə·rê·hū You crowned him

תַּ֭מְשִׁילֵהוּ <WH4910> tam·šî·lê·hū You made him ruler בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> bə·ma·‘ă·śê of the works יָדֶ֑יךָ <WH3027> yā·ḏe·ḵā of Your hands; כֹּ֝ל <WH3605> kōl everything שַׁ֣תָּה <WH7896> šat·tāh You have placed תַֽחַת־ <WH8478> ṯa·ḥaṯ- under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> raḡ·lāw his feet: ( Cited in and )

צֹנֶ֣ה <WH6792> ṣō·neh sheep וַאֲלָפִ֣ים <WH504> wa·’ă·lā·p̄îm and oxen, כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul·lām all וְ֝גַ֗ם <WH1571> wə·ḡam and even בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <WH929> ba·hă·mō·wṯ the beasts שָׂדָֽי׃ <WH7704> śā·ḏāy of the field,

צִפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> ṣip·pō·wr the birds שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma·yim of the air וּדְגֵ֣י <WH1709> ū·ḏə·ḡê and the fish הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hay·yām of the sea, עֹ֝בֵ֗ר <WH5674> ‘ō·ḇêr all that swim אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> ’ā·rə·ḥō·wṯ the paths יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> yam·mîm of the seas.

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, אֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nê·nū our Lord, מָֽה־ <WH4100> māh- how אַדִּ֥יר <WH117> ’ad·dîr majestic שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> mə·ḵā is Your name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl in all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth!
